participant_1.background:
I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh.
we have two sons.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
i am a full time mom.
i have a poodle named nanette.

participant_2.background:
I have a loving and supportive family who always encourages me to follow my dreams.
I am passionate about living my life to the fullest and enjoying every moment.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
i like to create websites.

content.text: My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
That's great! What kind of career do you have?
I'm a web developer! I love creating websites.
That's so cool! I'm a stay at home mom of two boys. I love it, but it can be challenging!
It sounds like you have a lot on your plate! I'm sure you're doing a great job.
What do you like to do to relax?
I love to listen to music and read. I also like to spend time with my family.
Those sound like great ways to relax! I love to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all different kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and mysteries.
I love historical fiction too! I haven't read a mystery in a while, though. I should read one soon.
You should! They're so much fun!
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll check out a few at the library.
You're welcome! I hope you enjoy them
